name: ivyhouse-terminal-monitor
description: Terminal output monitor with Proposed API first and extension fallback capture.

commands.title: IvyHouse Monitor: Open Last Codex Capture

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.codexCommand.description: Command word used to detect shell-integration fallback stream attachment.

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.codexTerminalNam.description: Name of the Codex terminal to monitor.

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.alwaysCaptureCod.description: Always write a rolling capture of the Codex terminal output to codex_live.txt (best-effort).

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.opencodeCommand.description: Command word used to detect shell-integration fallback stream attachment for OpenCode.

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.opencodeTerminal.description: Name of the OpenCode terminal to monitor.

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.alwaysCaptureOpe.description: Always write a rolling capture of the OpenCode terminal output to opencode_live.txt (best-effort).

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.captureMaxSecond.description: Max seconds to capture terminal output after sending a command.

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.captureSilenceMs.description: Stop capture when no new output arrives for this long (ms).

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.captureMaxBytes.description: Max bytes for a single capture file.

ivyhouseTerminalMonitor.captureDir.description: Workspace-relative directory to store capture files.
